snippet: “The Women on the 6th Floor” involves a bourgeois Parisian businessman who discovers a happy world with a small group of Spanish maids living in his family’s building.
lead_paragraph: “The Women on the 6th Floor” involves a bourgeois Parisian businessman who discovers a happy world with a small group of Spanish maids living in his family’s building.

headline.main: For a Bourgeois Frenchman, Happiness Is a Garret Away
